192171.敷地外なので 配置できません。: It's off the property. We can't put it...

Only the owner can arrange the furniture and

242916.<%sL_ITEM>は \n庭具倉庫にしまうことは できません。:
You can't put <%sL_ITEM> in the garden tool
shed...

243136.本宅を 設定していないため\n家具・庭具リストを 開けません。\n<br>\nマ:
If you haven't set up your main residence, you can't open the furniture and garden tools list. If you go to any of the houses in my
town and set up your main house, you can open the furniture and garden tools list...

243138.『庭具倉庫』の 説明です。\n<br>\nマイタウンでは つかうものからの\n庭:
How to use the garden tools warehouse... In My Town, you can not only place garden tools from the items you own, but you can also
share garden tools owned by other people... In My Town, you can share garden tools with the owner or other authorized users by
placing them in the "Garden Tools Warehouse" in the door menu... The garden tools in the warehouse will be marked as "Warehouse", so
try to move the tools to the warehouse and see how it looks...In addition, the garden tool shed is the garden tool management space for the whole of My Town, so any garden tools you place will
be included in the garden tool shed. The total number of garden tools you can have in My Town is 200... Once you have placed garden
tools in the garden tool storage, you can place them in the "My Town Garden Tools" section of the "Furniture and Garden Tools"
list...You can also transfer garden tools to your objects by selecting the "Touch and clean" option... Make good use of the garden tools
warehouse to place a variety of garden tools and create an attractive My Town...

243681.本宅を 設定していないため\n一部の機能が 使えません。\n<br>\nマイタウ:
You can't use some of the features because you haven't set up your home... If you go to any of the houses in My Town, you'll see a
sign that says "Home" and then you'll be able to use some of the features...

246998.視点固定と 家具・庭具リストの 説明です。\n<br>\n家具や庭具を 配置する:
Perspective Fixing and the Furniture and Garden List... When placing furniture and garden toolsPress to fix the view point... You can place furniture and garden tools from the furniture and garden tools list... Furniture and garden
tools can be placed in and out of the Furniture and Garden Toolbox and the Furniture and Garden Toolbox in the Door menu
of each house. If you haven't built a house yet, check the sign and build one...

246999.同じ機能をもつ庭具の数が マイタウン内の敷地と\n庭具倉庫内を合わせて 上限まで:
The number of garden tools that have the same function is limited to the number of sites in my town and the garden tools warehouse, so I
have to put <%sL_ITEM> away...

247699.『庭具倉庫』の 説明です。\n<br>\nマイタウンでは つかうものからの\n庭:
How to use the garden tools warehouse... In My Town, you can not only place garden tools from the items you own, but you can also
share garden tools owned by other people... In My Town, you can share garden tools with the owner or other authorized users by
placing them in the "Garden Tools Warehouse" in the door menu... In addition, the garden tools storage is a space where you can manage
your garden tools for the whole of your town, including the tools you have placed in the garden tools storage. Garden tools marked as
"Storage" in the list are shared garden tools that have been placed in the Storage by the owner or other authorized person, and can be
placed in the garden... If there are other garden tools nearby, you can move them from the same list... The total number of garden
tools you can have in your town is 150, including those in the garden tool shed... You can also transfer garden tools to objects
you want to use by selecting the "Touch and clean" option... Use the garden tools warehouse to create an attractive My Town by
placing a variety of garden tools...

247724.つかうものが いっぱいで\nこれ以上 庭具倉庫から 庭具を\nつかうものに 入れ:
We've got so many things to use, we can't put
any more garden tools from the garden tool
shed into the tools...

247990.現在 <%sL_ITEM>の 機能を\n使用中のため かたづけることができません:

when you are ready...

248334.庭具倉庫から 庭具がなくなりました。:

248335.<%sL_ITEM>が\n庭具倉庫から なくなりました。:

248628.権限がないので\n庭具を 取り出せません。\n時間を 置いてから お試しください:
I don't have clearance. I can't get the
garden tools out. I'll give you some time to
get your bearings.

248830.処理に失敗しました。\n時間を 置いてから お試しください。:
The process failed. Please give it some time
and try again.

257122.一時預かりぶくろに入っている 中身を\n全て 取り出さないと 新たに 家具・庭具:
We need to remove all the contents from the
storage closet before we can place any new
furniture or garden equipment...

257696.この家の 一時預かりぶくろに入っている\n中身が 全て 取り出されないと\n庭具:

until all the contents in the storage closet
have been removed...

282038.レプリカ庭具は 『つかうもの』に 戻せないので \n取り出すことはできません。:
